summary: This is an email from attorney Bruce Barket acknowledging receipt of an ex parte order from Judge Karas in case 16cr832. The order was to be filed under seal, indicating ongoing sealed proceedings in the Epstein-related case.

persons.name: Bruce Barket
persons.context: Attorney sending an email acknowledging receipt of an ex parte order from Judge Karas.

persons.name: Aida Leisenring
persons.context: Appears as a recipient (Cc) in the email correspondence regarding the ex parte order.

persons.name: Judge Karas
persons.context: Issued the ex parte order in case 16cr832, which was to be filed under seal.

connections.description: Bruce Barket is corresponding about an ex parte order issued by Judge Karas.

events.title: Ex parte order issued
events.description: Judge Karas issued an ex parte order in case 16cr832, which was to be filed under seal.

keyFacts: An ex parte order was issued by Judge Karas in case 16cr832 on or before June 12, 2020.
The order was to be filed under seal, indicating confidential or sensitive proceedings.
Attorney Bruce Barket was involved in receiving and acknowledging the order.
